title: If the allottees fails to deposit the amount in the phased manner as specified in the agreement within specified time limit, then the allotment shall stand cancelled and in such case the owner / developer shall dispose of such tenements in the market at the construction cost in ASR applicable to the land of the year of disposal plus 25% additional cost (2) to the persons belonging to the EWS / LIG category as determined by Government in Housing Department
clause_text: If the allottees fails to deposit the amount in the phased manner as specified in the agreement within specified time limit, then the allotment shall stand cancelled and in such case the owner / developer shall dispose of such tenements in the market at the construction cost in ASR applicable to the land of the year of disposal plus 25% additional cost (2) to the persons belonging to the EWS / LIG category as determined by Government in Housing Department.This shall also be applicable for plots mentioned in (a) above. If MHADA fails to send the list within the period of six months as specified above, Provided that these regulations shall not be applicable :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
